sn36.9:1.1: “Tisso ima, bhikkhave, vedana anicca sankhata paticcasamuppanna khayadhamma vayadhamma viragadhamma nirodhadhamma.
sn36.9:1.3: Sukha vedana, dukkha vedana, adukkhamasukha vedana—
sn36.9:1.4: ima kho, bhikkhave, tisso vedana anicca sankhata paticcasamuppanna khayadhamma vayadhamma viragadhamma nirodhadhamma”ti.
